Know all the world flags, capitals and places? Think so? Guess the country then! It's a geography game for all those geography quiz, trivia, brain and puzzle fans, interested people, casual players, kids, adults, students and teachers.
Geo Quiz Game - It's a casual trivia game where you can learn, travel through beautiful places, test your knowledge and have fun, either alone or with your friends.


Several game modes:
Ã¢Ëœâ€º Flags Quiz
Ã¢Ëœâ€º Capitals Quiz
Ã¢Ëœâ€º Photography Quiz (NEW)
Ã¢Ëœâ€º Extreme errorless mode
You get more points the faster you answer. Try to unlock all the achievements, hidden or not, and compare them with your friends!


How to play Geo Quiz Game?
1. Choose the game mode.
2. Guess the right answers within 4 possibilities.
3. The faster you are, more points you'll get.
4. Guess the country!

Compete and compare your scores and unlocked achievements with your friends. Try to be the best!
